info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Richland County through 915 PM CDT... At 822 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stiles, or 28 miles southwest of Wahpeton, moving east at 25 mph. This storm was part of a larger cluster of thunderstorms producing very heavy rainfall through southern Richland county. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hankinson, Lidgerwood, Fairmount, Lamars, Blackmer, Sonora and Stiles. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
